email_body: George, We should hear from the bank in Houston on Monday. The best numbers and times to reach me: work 713-853-7041 fax 713-464-2391 cell 713-410-4679 home 713-463-8626 pallen70@hotmail.com (home) pallen@enron.com (work) I am usually at work M-F 7am-5:30pm. Otherwise try me at home then on my cell. Keiths numbers are: work 713-853-7069 fax 713-464-2391 cell 713-502-9402 home 713-667-5889 kholst@enron.com Phillip
